original_title: Animals Under Anaesthesia: Speculations on the Dreamlife of Beasts
overview: Part lyrical document, part farce, Animals Under Anaesthesia: Speculations On the Dreamlife of Beasts explores the imaginary unconscious minds of animals. Images of sex, death and the natural world are made manifest in the murky and disquieting dreams of a dog, a cat, a pig and a rabbit.
title: Animals Under Anaesthesia: Speculations on the Dreamlife of Beasts
